message: I feel no shame in sharing a HN grown social music startup. To be honest I'm only interested in having the HN and related community sign up for beta as the majority of the internet would be useless in giving feedback. So here it is www.makevolu.me
I shared on facebook and the url shown is: http://makevolu.me/?r . Is it correct? The email I used was pedro.howat@gmail.com
As a huge music junkie I couldn't resist but I think something went wrong with my referral url.

Hey Pedro, I just put about 20 made up e-mails in and it looks like the referral url is giving a non assigned url once in a while. It doesn't appear to be following a pattern. I'll look into it and get back to you with a fix.
I plan on re building the sign up page it was just something quick i could put up

Hey, so found a bug in the code. We're hacking away right now to fix it, what happened was that your email was denied and never hit the database. I've manually entered you and your referral link is http://makevolu.me/?r=kq
We'd love to cover you guys on StartupLi.st, please send me an email if interested, jeff (at) startupli.st
